report.title: My Life and Near Death
report.author: Tbone
report.bodytext: I started out doing IM shots of Nubain. It was cool, but my tolerance rose fast. Then I was introduced to oxy. My first trials with it were IM shots as well. Started off with just 20mgs at first. Then like everything, that went up. Then I started banging it (IV) thats when shit got bad. /n /n I was doing anywhere between 30-60 twenties a week. The withdrawals were horrible. And the habit cost me everything. Cold sweats, bodY aches, dry heaving...all symptoms of withdrawal. Not to mention the crazy shit I think about doing to get it.
